aber.dcs.cs22510.clg11.model

Class Datastore

  • java.lang.Object
    • aber.dcs.cs22510.clg11.model.Datastore

  • public class Datastore
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all internal data used by the system to process existing and new race time logs (Nodes, Courses and Entrants).
